name: Elemental Channel, Mythic

sections.text: Your Elemental Channel can affect any elemental subtype, not just the one you chose when you took Elemental Channel. Each time you use Elemental Channel, you must pick one elemental subtype before using the feat. You can expend one use of mythic power when you use Elemental Channel to choose a second elemental subtype to affect.
sections.name: Benefits

description: Your power over elemental beings is nearly absolute.
